name: Monster Spells
description:
A game made for the 32-bit game jam 2022!

This is a 3D typing game built in Phaser JS and Enable 3D. Please be patient while the game loads! Thank you for playing :-)

Credits:

  • Dev by Melky Pop
  • Art:
    • Monsters by Quaternius
    • House by hreikin / Daniel Anderson
    • Trees by Mitylernal
    • Ground texture by HellGate
    • Additional art by Melky Pop
  • Music by Migfus20
